title: Tourism - City of Martin
snippet: Visit Martin, Tennessee and explore all our unique shopping, nationally recognized restaurants, and beautiful downtown.

title: About Martin
snippet: The Martin area is characterized by level to gently rolling land with an average elevation of about 400 feet. Most industrial areas are suitable for immediate construction with very little site preparation required.

title: Historic Downtown Martin - City of Martin
snippet: Explore Historic Downtown Martin, TNâ€”home to local shops, dining, and community events with small-town charm and Southern hospitality.

title: Martin Stockyards - City of Martin
snippet: Discover the freshest farm-to-table offerings at Martin Stockyards, a new gem in Martin, Tennessee. Martin Stockyards prides itself on providing high-quality, locally sourced meats, including beef from their own farm, pork from Tosh Farms, as well as chicken and lamb.
